p: 2-[(2 E,4 E,6 E)-8-(Hydroxymethyl)-6-methyldeca-2,4,6-trien-2-yl]-2,3,4,6-tetrahydro-4-hydroxy-6-methoxy-3-methyl-5 H-pyrano[3,2- c]pyridin-5-one, pale yellow amorphous solid; for 1H and 13C NMR data, see Table 2 and Supporting Information Figure S16. HRESIMS m/ z: 390.2270 [M + H] + (calcd for C 22H 32NO 5 +, m/ z 390.2275, Δ = 1.2 ppm) and m/ z: 412.2089 [M + Na] + (calcd for C 22H 31NO 5Na +, m/ z 412.2094, Δ = 1.3 ppm).
